DataSource.query:
select
distinct
case
  when instr(kd_schl,'_IMMO') <> 0
  then 'A_KP2_Immobilien'
  else 'A_'||nvl(vvs,'Zentrale')
end,
kd_schl,
CASE WHEN kd_schl IS NULL THEN
   ''
ELSE
   (
    case 
       when instr(kd_schl,'_IMMO') <> 0
       then substr('KD '||kd_nr||' Immo '||kbez,1,80)
       else substr('KD ' || kd_nr || ' VVS ' || vvs || ' ' || kbez,1,80)
    end
   )
END,
'N',
CASE WHEN kd_schl IS NULL THEN
   ''
ELSE
   'Kunde'
END,
stichtag

from
dtl_nvr_ertraege

where
stichtag =(select stichtag from nvr_parameter)
and substr(satzart,1,2) <> 'OE'
AND herkunft <>'DTL_NVR_PROVISIONEN'
ORDER BY stichtag,1,2 ASC
